___name.description: The name of the Redis cache.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Parameters supplied to CreateOrUpdate Redis operation.

___enableNonSslPort.description: If the value is true, then the non-SLL Redis server port (6379) will be enabled.

___shardCount.description: The number of shards to be created on a Premium Cluster Cache.

___virtualNetwork.description: The exact ARM resource ID of the virtual network to deploy the Redis cache in. Example format: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/Microsoft.ClassicNetwork/VirtualNetworks/vnet1

___sku.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create Redis operation.

___redisVersion.description: RedisVersion parameter has been deprecated. As such, it is no longer necessary to provide this parameter and any value specified is ignored.

___staticIP.description: Required when deploying a Redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network.

___subnet.description: Required when deploying a Redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network.

___redisConfiguration.description: All Redis Settings. Few possible keys: rdb-backup-enabled,rdb-storage-connection-string,rdb-backup-frequency,maxmemory-delta,maxmemory-policy,notify-keyspace-events,maxmemory-samples,slowlog-log-slower-than,slowlog-max-len,list-max-ziplist-entries,list-max-ziplist-value,hash-max-ziplist-entries,hash-max-ziplist-value,set-max-intset-entries,zset-max-ziplist-entries,zset-max-ziplist-value etc.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___properties.description: Parameters supplied to CreateOrUpdate Redis operation.

_88Sku.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create Redis operation.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___capacity.description: What size of Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: for C family (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), for P family (1, 2, 3, 4).

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___name.description: What type of Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: (Basic, Standard, Premium).

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___family.description: Which family to use. Valid values: (C, P).
